entry.title: Explosion Kills Ukrainian POWs Held by Russian-Backed Forces
entry.content: An explosion at a detention camp in Russian-held territory in eastern Ukraine killed numerous Ukrainian prisoners of war, according to Ukrainian and Russian authorities, who blamed each other for the attack.

entry.title: Pope Francis, in Canada, Tries to Distinguish Evangelization From Colonialism
entry.content: The pontiff, who apologized for Catholics’ role in forced assimilation of indigenous children in Canada, also praised early missionaries to the country for their appreciation of indigenous cultures.

entry.title: Ukrainian Forces Hamstrung by Pledge Not to Fire Into Russia
entry.content: As Russia hammers Kharkiv from across the border, Ukrainian forces say restrictions on the use of Western weapons are limiting their ability to respond. ‘Our hands are tied,’ said one soldier.

entry.title: How the German Economic Machine Broke Down
entry.content: An energy crisis caused by Russia, slowing Chinese growth, supply-chain blockages and an aging workforce are ending the decadeslong reign of Germany’s export-focused manufacturing.
